testcase.classname: As a user, I want to search for a product and verify the product details
testcase.name: Search for product and proceed to checkout
testcase.system-out: Given Load Trace Parts website..............................................passed When I enter Photoelectric Sensor in the textbox and click the Search icon..passed Then I select the first product that is displayed...........................passed Then I verify that the Product Title has LD46...............................passed And I verify that the Product Description has LD46-UL-715...................passed Then I Right click on the 3D Model Product Image that is displayed in the 3D Viewer.passed And In the Views option that is displayed I Click on Left and verify that the 3D Viewer displays the left side of the image.passed
